name: Quran Live Multilanguage
author: Karim Bahmed

sections.description:
• Quran Live Multilanguage translated into 29 languages.
  • Full ajax version and responsive with fullscreen button
  • Fully customizable from the admin area.
  • Multi recitators : 7 cheikhs
  • Add an area for personal css

The plugin uses mp3 files that come from https://quran.s3.fr-par.scw.cloud
These site are mine

  • demo page

Languages :

  • Arabic
  • English
  • French
  • German
  • Dutch
  • Russian
  • Albanian
  • Azerbaijani
  • Bengali
  • Bulgarian
  • Bosnian
  • Chinese
  • Czech
  • Indonesian
  • Italian
  • Kurdish
  • Malay
  • Norwegian
  • Portuguese
  • Romanian
  • Somali
  • Spanish
  • Swedish
  • Turkish
  • Urdu
  • Hindi
  • Persian
  • Thai
  • Uzbek
sections.installation:
1. (Recommanded) install the plugin from the administration.
    plugin-> add new-> in “Search Plugins” tape: Quran Live Multilanguage
    (if you manually install consider changing chmod on the ftp, otherwise you risk having errors.)

  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. shortcode : You can generate a shortcode and put in your page
sections.changelog:
1.0

  • initial plugin

1.0.1

  • Fix some errors for last version wordpress

1.0.2

  • Fix url for audio verse

1.0.3

  • Add mp3 on cloud storage
